skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Shoot a fireball toward enemies in front of you that explodes on impact

skills.name: Ice Beam
skills.description: Channel a line of ice shards at enemies in front of you

skills.name: Whirlwind
skills.description: Summon a whirlwind that damages enemies and boosts allies' movement speed

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: Make the earth rumble, damaging enemies around you

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Shoot a ball of light that heals allies on impact

skills.name: Dark Pulse
skills.description: Channel a line of ice shards at enemies in front of you
